message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the product at a price of $14,000. I believe this offer reflects the value it holds for you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counteroffer at $12,000 for the product.
Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the value. I could meet you halfway between our offers at $13,000.
